Threat: Nature: Earthquake, major natural disaster destroys server
Countermeasure: The core infrastructure (web server, database and core CA) is completely redundant (instances in CH and IS)
Regular backups, geographically redundant infrastructure, an administrator is on call 24/7

Threat: Nature: Pollution, dust decreases lifespan of components
Countermeasure: Clean server room every three month by specialized cleaning crew

Threat: Governmental Agency, Independent Contractors, System Administrator: Malicious hardware is added
Countermeasure: Cleaning staff is monitored by iMovies security staff, background checks are performed on system administrators before hiring them
Additional Countermeasures: Renting a rack space in a data centre would ensure professional access control and certified security standards.
